title: Complete Square Filter Kit Compatible with Cokin P Series - Includes: Graduated Color Green, Yellow, Purple, Orange, Pink, Brown, Blue and Red Filters + Graduated ND2, ND4, ND8 and Full ND2, ND4, ND8 Filters + 52, 55, 58, 62, 67, 72, 77MM Adapter Rings + 2 Filter Holder + 2 Lens Hood + Premium MagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
description: *Goja Brand. Not a Cokin Product. Manufactured to meet the highest standard of design and quality. There are many similar looking products available but none offer the same level of quality, clarity, and durability for such an affordable price. Please feel free to try these filters for yourself and if you are not happy with this bundle for any reason, we will be happy to take it back for a full refund.-Graduated Color Filter Set for Cokin P Series - Red, Blue, Orange, Yellow, Pink, Coffee, Green and Purple Square Filters*- Graduated color filters provide a gradual color transition for a smooth blending effect.- Simply mount the adapter ring and filter holder to the front of your lens, then slide in different filters to take beautiful, colorful shots.-ND Filter Set for Cokin P Series - Graduated ND2, ND4, ND8 and Full ND2, ND4, ND8 Square Filters*- ND filters reduce the amount of light reaching the film without affecting the color. Can be used to enable slower shutter speeds. Great for portraiture and outdoor scenes.-52mm, 55mm, 58mm, 62mm, 67mm, 72mm, 77mm Adapter Rings for Cokin P Series Filter Holder*- Made of high quality anodized black aluminum.-Square Filter Holder Compatible with Cokin P Series*- Quantity: 2- To use the square filter holder, slide the filter holder onto the ring adapter until it snaps into place. The filter holder can hold up to three square filters at the same time allowing for creative use of light correction or special effects.-Square Lens Hood Compatible with Cokin P Series*- Quantity: 2- This lens hood is designed to work with Cokin P Series filter sets. Easily mounts onto your filter-holder. Stackable design allows you to attach several of these lens hoods on top of each other, allowing for increased versatility and protection from accidental impact.-MagicFiber Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
